properties.description: On prem SQL Server hosting Cold Harbour GRG
Integration runtime to Avery's virtual network
Clears the Dest Tables then inserts the data  from AEMS tables to avoid data loss when issues with the transfer occur

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	A.intranetnew,
	H.Exch_Code,
	A.GLCODE,
	A.Period,
	NULL AS Actual_Desc,
	A.Amount,
	'TRUE' AS PeriodClosed,
	'1900-01-01 00:00:00' AS LoadedDateTime
FROM 
	actuals2 AS A

	LEFT JOIN Homes AS H
		ON H.IntranetNew = A.IntranetNew
WHERE
--	A.intranetnew IS NULL
	A.Period >= '2023-01-01'
ORDER BY
	A.Period DESC,
	A.intranetnew
